bugs.title: CVE-2020-36281 leptonica: heap-based buffer overflow in pixFewColorsOctcubeQuantMixed in colorquant1.c [fedora-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2020-36281 leptonica: heap-based buffer overflow in pixFewColorsOctcubeQuantMixed in colorquant1.c [fedora-all]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2020-36281 leptonica: heap-based buffer overflow in pixFewColorsOctcubeQuantMixed in colorquant1.c

long_desc.thetext:
Leptonica before 1.80.0 allows a heap-based buffer over-read in pixFewColorsOctcubeQuantMixed in colorquant1.c.

Reference:
https://bugs.chromium.org/p/oss-fuzz/issues/detail?id=22140

Upstream patch:
https://github.com/DanBloomberg/leptonica/commit/5ee24b398bb67666f6d173763eaaedd9c36fb1e5

Created leptonica tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: epel-7 [bug 1939140]
Affects: fedora-all [bug 1939138]


Created mingw-leptonica tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1939139]

This is an automatically created tracking bug!  It was created to ensure
that one or more security vulnerabilities are fixed in affected versions
of fedora-all.

For comments that are specific to the vulnerability please use bugs filed
against the "Security Response" product referenced in the "Blocks" field.

For more information see:
http://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Security/TrackingBugs

When submitting as an update, use the fedpkg template provided in the next
comment(s).  This will include the bug IDs of this tracking bug as well as
the relevant top-level CVE bugs.

Please also mention the CVE IDs being fixed in the RPM changelog and the
fedpkg commit message.

NOTE: this issue affects multiple supported versions of Fedora. While only
one tracking bug has been filed, please correct all affected versions at
the same time.  If you need to fix the versions independent of each other,
you may clone this bug as appropriate.

Use the following template to for the 'fedpkg update' request to submit an
update for this issue as it contains the top-level parent bug(s) as well as
this tracking bug.  This will ensure that all associated bugs get updated
when new packages are pushed to stable.

=====

bugs.title: CVE-2020-36277 leptonica: DoS via an incorrect left shift in pixConvert2To8 in pixconv.c [fedora-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2020-36277 leptonica: DoS via an incorrect left shift in pixConvert2To8 in pixconv.c [fedora-all]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2020-36277 leptonica: DoS via an incorrect left shift in pixConvert2To8 in pixconv.c

long_desc.thetext:
Leptonica before 1.80.0 allows a denial of service (application crash) via an incorrect left shift in pixConvert2To8 in pixconv.c.

https://bugs.chromium.org/p/oss-fuzz/issues/detail?id=21997
